page.title: 12WYBERTON COLTS
page.content: WYBERTON COLTS Every Saturday morning at wyberton playing field we play football.We play for a team called Wyberton Colts and in the week or on Sunday afternoon we play against other teams.The under 12 team are one of the best in England because they won a national tournament. We have just had some coaching by Leicester city football club. Wyberton playing field is also used for other things.There are some swings and a roundabout which the people around there play on.The cub's hut is not that far away and often they come down to play games or practice their sports.
